<Text: Counting Cars is an American reality television series, shown on History, and produced by Leftfield Pictures.>

Text: Counting Cars:  The series, which is the third spinoff of "Pawn Stars", is filmed in Las Vegas, Nevada, where it chronicles the daily activities at Count's Kustoms, an automobile restoration and customization company owned and operated by Danny Koker, who previously appeared as a recurring expert on "Pawn Stars".
